item.title: Meta proposes new scalable memory layers that improve knowledge, reduce hallucinations
item.description: According to Meta, memory layers may be the the answer to LLM hallucinations as they don't require huge compute resources at inference time.

item.title: Meta retreats from fact-checking content: what it means for businesses
item.description: The changes could make it easier for users to criticize brands or implicate them in conspiracies, and harder for brands to force takedowns.

item.title: Oshkosh launches EV and other tech for specialty vehicles with safety, quiet and cleanliness in mind
item.description: At CES 2025, Oshkosh launched a number of specialty vehicles with better electric power, safety, quiet and cleanliness.

item.title: McAfee launches scam detector to stop scams before they strike
item.description: Scams are everywhere. McAfee’s new scam detector spots and stops scams across text, email, and video to keep you from being fooled.

item.title: Onscreen’s TV-based AI companion provides help for elder caregivers
item.description: After starting out with a TV-based product, Onscreen is bringing its Joy AI companion app for seniors to Android tablets and iPads.
